instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
threads.message:
this problem is not specific to any one job but after a few jobs, including my personal 2013 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> the macbook doesnt chime when starting
ive found this on 2013, 2014 and 2015 macbooks, its not really a problem because i can tell when its on when the lcd turns on
my question is, what makes the chime and why would it not chime after water damage repair

threads.title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
threads.message: Did you PRAM reset these laptops ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
threads.message: Volume turned down is OSX. PRAM reset will clear that.

threads.title: [SOLVED]macbooks that work 100% but dont chime
threads.message: done thanks, i feel stupid now
